title: Vice Prez congratulates IIT Madras for bringing out science and tech magazine 'Shaastra' - Times of India
content: Vice Prez congratulates IIT Madras for bringing out science and tech magazine 'Shaastra'  Times of India
description: Education News: Supported by 50,000 alumni of IIT Madras, 'Shaastra' is intended to serve as a platform to showcase sterling achievements in science, technology and i
